properties.description: Wednesday is our upcycling group in the workshop where we do up furniture for the shop in Lapstone Road Thursday is our men's group where we give them a cooked meal and chat paly card and dominos.
properties.title: Millom Networking Centre Ltd, Millom

properties.description: Millom Network Centre are working in partnership with Millom ICC, Copeland Borough Council and Cumbria County Council to deliver free, weekly Warm Wellness Hubs at Millom Guide Hall The Warm Wellness Hubs will be a place for residents to come and keep warm and receive a warm meal and refreshments.We will be inviting organisations along to deliver information and advice sessions.
properties.title: Warm Wellness Hub in the Guide Hall, Millom
